column4: I think all the hype left me disappointed. Smoque appears as if it is a BBQ joint you would find in the Middle of Texas
column5: such as the one on Friday Night Lights
column6: but in my opinion the sauce was just not that great
column7: and sauce makes or breaks the BBQ. The sauce is tangy
column8: which I usually am a fan of but it detracted from the food. I did enjoy the brisket and sausage.
